email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 85,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel SEA HORIZON, DWT 92,000, LOA 230m, for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 22.50 per MT. The laycan is 1-5 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 22.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider a lower rate? Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and the vessel's ETA at Richards Bay?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Considering your feedback, we can adjust the freight rate to USD 21.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. The SEA HORIZON is expected to arrive at Richards Bay on 30 September. Let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 21.75 sounds reasonable. We accept the terms and would like to proceed with the SEA HORIZON. Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez
